column6:
Can Black Bolt hold it together as he suffers the unkindest cut of all? Betrayal, madness and a battle for the ages as the U.S.A. strikes back at Attilan. Super-powered Kamikaze Marines go head-to-head with the Incomparable Inhumans in a battle for death ... or glory.,2007,6
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:David Hine | colorist:Frazer Irving | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):John Watson
